name: The Batch RPG
description:
THIS IS ONLY FOR WINDOWS. WILL NOT WORK ON MAC.

Hey! Welcome to the BATCH RPG. In batch! ;)

Source code is ALWAYS available. This is based on my other unfinished game Spicy Chicken Quest! But it was in violation of the Terms of Use for itch.io, so, im forced to make a version without any swears, or racism. Enjoy my sadly clean version of the game.
